hasPrizes.title: Tender design contest has prizes
hasPrizes.description: A True/False field to indicate if the design contest has prizes. Required by the EU

Prizes.title: Tender prizes
Prizes.description: Details about the prize(s) for the winner(s) of the design contest. Required by the EU

paymentsToParticipants.title: Tender payments to participants
paymentsToParticipants.description: Details of any payments that will be made to participants in the design contest. Required by the EU

serviceContractAward.title: Tender service contract award
serviceContractAward.description: A True/False field to indicate whether a service contract will be awarded to the winner(s) of the design contest. Required by the EU

juryDecisionBinding.title: Tender design contest jury decision binding
juryDecisionBinding.description: A True/False field to indicate whether the jury decision of the design contest is binding. Required by the EU

juryMembers.title: Tender design contest jury members
juryMembers.description: A list of the jury members for of the design contest. Required by the EU

participants.title: Tender design contest participants
participants.description: A list of the pre-selected participants for the design contest. Required by the EU

designContest.title: Tender design contest
designContest.description: The tender takes the form of a design contest. Fields that relate specifically to the design contest are modelled here. Required by the EU
